String.Creator: npopov
String.Value: Element of the System Units tree.

String.Creator: npopov
String.Value: Invokes the decoration of the treeItem element.

String.Creator: npopov
String.Value: Abstract class implementing the decorator classes for the System Units widget. The decorator works as follows: 1) prepare() method extracts the data required for decoration from the XML elements containing the request for update and the response to this request for the System Units widgets. The extracted data are distributed among three associative arrays (channel2Info, unit2Info, instance2Info). 2) as a result of decorate() method call and based on the data from the associative arrays, the items of the System Units widget tree are decorated. The respective decorate* method (e.g., decorateInstance) is called for each type of the system elements. Methods can implement the business logic of the system elements (e.g., generation of alerts under certain conditions) as well as return the list of decorations (MonitoringTreeItemDecoration) to be applied to the item of the System Units widget tree.
